subject: Baseball
Steroids
lead_paragraph: The House committee has postponed a hearing next week that was to feature Roger Clemens and his accuser so that the panel can launch its own investigation into Clemens’s denial that he used steroids.
snippet: The House committee has postponed a hearing next week that was to feature Roger Clemens and his accuser so that the panel can launch its own investigation into Clemens’s denial that he used steroids.
